subject: Add environments reference section to CLAUDE.md
body:
Clarifies the confusing "production" terminology:
- Fireblocks console (US Production) vs workspace (Testnet)
- SDK env=production means main infrastructure, not real money
- Firebase and app build environments explained
- Production migration checklist added

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add environments reference section to CLAUDE.md
